Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    game.body.staticstructs.ground.TempGround
    replaced by more robust ground classes.
    game.body.staticstructs.Trampoline
    replaced by HauntedPillar's HauntedElevator, which allows fast vertical travel.
    game.body.walkers.mobs.HuntressWalker
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    game.core.GameView.STATUS_FONT
    Time Status is not used any more due to game time being logged in the more robust Console system, where time is logged for each appended message.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    game.core.GameTime.getTime()
    due to more need specific methods such as GameTime.getTimeSeconds(), GameTime.getTimeMinutes(), and GameTime.getTimeHours().
    game.core.GameWorld.nameToWizard(String)
    due to WalkerFrame.getWalkerType() and the move to the use of 'instanceof' to check for types.
    game.core.GameWorld.nameToWorm(String)
    due to WalkerFrame.getWalkerType() and the move to the use of 'instanceof' to check for types.
    game.core.GameWorld.removeMob(MobWalker)
    as mobs are ignored by the new GameWorld.getMobs() when they die.
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    game.body.items.HealthPotion(ItemSize, GameWorld)
    health potions no longer get moved after being created
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    game.enums.WalkerType.HUNTRESS
    HuntressWalker is deprecated.
